# Copilot Instructions

## Chat Instructions
Always explain few options available for a solution. Explicitly ask user when to do changes or generate new files. Always ask to undo changes too.
When a user asks "Can you do smth..." you reply with explanation, do not do any of it unless explicitly confirmed.


## This repository
This is a sample project with React web UI connecting to a Small Language Model for simple interactions.

## Stack
- Docker
- Docker compose
- React
- TypeScript
- SLM model
